faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Get answers to common questions about working with us.

q1.question: How long does it take to build a website?
q1.answer: Most websites take 2-4 weeks depending on complexity. Simple landing pages can be done in 1 week, while complex web applications may take 2-3 months.

q2.question: What are your payment terms?
q2.answer: We typically require 50% upfront to start the project, with the remaining 50% due upon completion. For larger projects, we offer milestone-based payments.

q3.question: Do you provide ongoing support?
q3.answer: Yes! We offer support packages starting from basic maintenance to full managed services. All projects include 30 days of free support after launch.

q4.question: Can you integrate with local payment systems?
q4.answer: Absolutely. We specialize in integrating local payment methods including Mobile Money (MTN, Orange), bank transfers, and international options like PayPal and Stripe.

q5.question: Do you work with businesses outside Cameroon?
q5.answer: Yes, we work with businesses across Africa and internationally. Our team communicates in both English and French.
